_source.title: Activity
Active Users by Type
_source.visState: {"type":"timelion","title":"Active Users by Type","params":{"expression":".es(index='alpha-user-stats-*', timefield='usr_created_date',  q='NOT usr_organization:\"None\"', metric='cardinality:usr_organization', split='usr_organization:15').cusum().label(regex='.*:(.*) >.*', label=$1)","interval":"1M"}}

_source.title: User Sessions per Hour
_source.visState: {"type":"timelion","title":"User Sessions per Hour","params":{"expression":".es(index='yesterdays-*', timefield='session_timestamp', metric='cardinality:session_id').bars().label('User Sessions per Hour')","interval":"1h"}}

_source.title: Total Number of Organizations
_source.visState: {"title":"Total Number of Organizations","type":"timelion","params":{"expression":".es(index='alpha-users*', timefield='usr_created_date', metric=\"cardinality:usr_organization\", split=\"usr_organization:20\").cusum().if(gt, .es(index='alpha-users*', timefield='usr_created_date', metric=\"cardinality:usr_organization\", split=\"usr_organization:20\"), 1).sum().label('Number of Organizations')","interval":"1d"},"aggs":[],"listeners":{}}

_source.title: User Account Creation over Time
_source.visState: {"title":"User Account Creation over Time","type":"timelion","params":{"expression":".es(index='alpha-users*', timefield='usr_created_date', metric='cardinality:usr_email').cusum().label('Total Number of Users')","interval":"auto"},"aggs":[],"listeners":{}}

_source.title: Alpha HydroShare Users
_source.visState: {"type":"timelion","title":"Alpha HydroShare Users","params":{"expression":".es(index='alpha-user*', timefield='usr_created_date', metric='cardinality:usr_email').label(0).bars(50).label('Unique User Accounts per Month'), .es(index='alpha-user*', timefield='usr_created_date', metric='cardinality:usr_email').cusum().label('Total Unique User Accounts').lines(steps=1).color(green), .es(index='alpha-user*', timefield='usr_created_date', metric='cardinality:usr_email').cusum().label(0).points(5).color(green)","interval":"1M"}}

_source.title: Total Number of Resources per Month
_source.visState: {"title":"Total Number of Resources per Month","type":"timelion","params":{"expression":".es(index='www-resource*', timefield='res_date_created', metric='sum:count').label('Resources Created per Month').bars(25)","interval":"1M"},"aggs":[],"listeners":{}}

_source.title: Change in HydroShare Activity
_source.visState: {"title":"Change in HydroShare Activity","type":"timelion","params":{"expression":".es(index='*activity*', timefield='session_timestamp',q='action:begin_session AND NOT user_id:None').derivative().bars().max(0).label(\"Increase in Activity\"), .es(index='*activity*', timefield='session_timestamp',q='action:begin_session AND NOT user_id:None').derivative().bars().min(0).label(\"Decrease In Activity\")","interval":"1w"},"aggs":[],"listeners":{}}

_source.title: HydroShare Users By Organization
_source.visState: {"title":"HydroShare Users By Organization","type":"pie","params":{"shareYAxis":true,"addTooltip":true,"addLegend":true,"legendPosition":"right","isDonut":false},"aggs":[{"id":"1","enabled":true,"type":"count","schema":"metric","params":{"customLabel":"Number of Users By Organization"}},{"id":"2","enabled":true,"type":"terms","schema":"segment","params":{"field":"usr_organization.raw","size":10,"order":"desc","orderBy":"1","customLabel":"User Type"}}],"listeners":{}}

_source.title: HydroShare Users By Type
_source.visState: {"title":"HydroShare Users By Type","type":"pie","params":{"shareYAxis":true,"addTooltip":true,"addLegend":true,"legendPosition":"right","isDonut":false},"aggs":[{"id":"1","enabled":true,"type":"count","schema":"metric","params":{"customLabel":"Number of Users By Type"}},{"id":"2","enabled":true,"type":"terms","schema":"segment","params":{"field":"usr_type.raw","size":10,"order":"desc","orderBy":"1","customLabel":"User Type"}}],"listeners":{}}

_source.title: HydroShare Organizations
_source.visState: {"title":"HydroShare Organizations","type":"timelion","params":{"expression":".es(index='www-users-*', timefield='usr_created_date', q=\"report_date:[now-1d TO now]\", metric=\"cardinality:usr_organization\", split=\"usr_organization:1000\").if(gt, .es(index='www-user*', timefield='usr_created_date',  q=\"report_date:[now-1d TO now]\", metric=\"cardinality:usr_organization\", split=\"usr_organization:1000\"), 1).sum().label('Unique Organizations').bars().color(#7599EA), .es(index='www-user*', timefield='usr_created_date', q=\"report_date:[now-1d TO now]\", metric=\"cardinality:usr_organization\", split=\"usr_organization:1000\").cusum().if(gt, .es(index='www-user*', timefield='usr_created_date', q=\"report_date:[now-1d TO now]\", metric=\"cardinality:usr_organization\", split=\"usr_organization:1000\"), 1).sum().label('Total Unique Organizations').lines(steps=0).color(#092F87).yaxis(2)","interval":"auto"},"aggs":[],"listeners":{}}

_source.title: HydroShare Users
_source.visState: {"title":"HydroShare Users","type":"timelion","params":{"expression":".es(index='www-users-*', timefield='usr_created_date', q=\"report_date:[now-1d TO now]\", metric='cardinality:usr_email').label(0).bars().label('Unique User Accounts'), .es(index='www-users-*', timefield='usr_created_date', q=\"report_date:[now-1d TO now]\", metric='cardinality:usr_email').cusum().label('Total Unique User Accounts').lines(steps=0).color(green).yaxis(2)","interval":"auto"},"aggs":[],"listeners":{}}

_source.title: Resources by Sharing Status (Table)
Resources by Type (Table)
Total Size of Resources
_source.visState: {"title":"Total Size of Resources","type":"timelion","params":{"expression":".es(index='www-resources-*', timefield='res_date_created',q=\"report_date:[now-1d TO now]\", metric='sum:res_size').cusum().label('Disk Size in GB').divide(1000000000).lines(fill=2,steps=0)","interval":"1w"},"aggs":[],"listeners":{}}

_source.title: All Resources by Type
_source.visState: {"title":"All Resources by Type","type":"timelion","params":{"expression":".es(index=www-resources*,      timefield=res_date_created,q=\"report_date:[now-1d TO now]\", split=res_type:50, metric='sum:count').cusum().label(regex='.*:(.*)>.*', label='$1').lines(fill=5, steps=0, stack=1)","interval":"1w"},"aggs":[],"listeners":{}}

_source.title: Resources by Sharing Status
_source.visState: {"title":"Resources by Sharing Status","type":"timelion","params":{"expression":".es(index='www-resources-*', timefield='res_date_created', q=\"report_date:[now-1d TO now]\", split=res_pub_status:4).cusum().lines(fill=5, steps=0, stack=1).label(regex='.*:(.*)>.*', label='$1')","interval":"1w"},"aggs":[],"listeners":{}}

_source.title: Users by Type (latest)
_source.visState: {"title":"Users by Type (latest)","type":"pie","params":{"shareYAxis":true,"addTooltip":true,"addLegend":true,"legendPosition":"right","isDonut":false},"aggs":[{"id":"1","enabled":true,"type":"count","schema":"metric","params":{"customLabel":"Number of Users By Type"}},{"id":"2","enabled":true,"type":"terms","schema":"segment","params":{"field":"usr_type.raw","size":100,"order":"desc","orderBy":"1","customLabel":"User Type"}}],"listeners":{}}

_source.title: Users by Date Created (latest)
App Launches by Domain
_source.visState: {"type":"timelion","title":"App Launches by Domain","params":{"expression":".es(index='*activity*', timefield='session_timestamp',q='action:app_launch AND NOT user_id:None', split='user_email_domain:20').cusum().lines(fill=2,stack=1).label(regex='.*:(.*)>.*', label='$1')","interval":"auto"}}

_source.title: Directory
User Sessions per Month
_source.visState: {"title":"User Sessions per Month","type":"timelion","params":{"expression":".es(index='*activity*', timefield='session_timestamp', q='action:begin_session AND NOT user_id:None').lines(fill=1).label('User Sessions').bars().color(skyblue)","interval":"1M"},"aggs":[],"listeners":{}}

_source.title: Active Users by Type (latest)
_source.visState: {"title":"Active Users by Type (latest)","type":"pie","params":{"shareYAxis":true,"addTooltip":true,"addLegend":true,"legendPosition":"right","isDonut":false},"aggs":[{"id":"1","enabled":true,"type":"count","schema":"metric","params":{"customLabel":"Number of Users By Type"}},{"id":"2","enabled":true,"type":"terms","schema":"segment","params":{"field":"usr_type.raw","size":100,"order":"desc","orderBy":"1","customLabel":"User Type"}}],"listeners":{}}

_source.title: temp2
Cumulative Resources by Sharing Status (latest)
_source.visState: {"title":"Cumulative Resources by Sharing Status (latest)","type":"timelion","params":{"expression":".es(index='*resources*latest*', timefield='res_date_created', split=res_pub_status:4).cusum().lines(fill=5, steps=0, stack=1).label(regex='.*:(.*)>.*', label='$1')","interval":"1w"},"aggs":[],"listeners":{}}

_source.title: Cumulative Resources by Type (latest)
_source.visState: {"title":"Cumulative Resources by Type (latest)","type":"timelion","params":{"expression":".es(index=*resources*latest*,      timefield=res_date_created, split=res_type:50, metric='sum:count').cusum().label(regex='.*:(.*)>.*', label='$1').lines(fill=5, steps=0, stack=1)","interval":"auto"},"aggs":[],"listeners":{}}

_source.title: Cumulative Size of Resources (latest)
_source.visState: {"title":"Cumulative Size of Resources (latest)","type":"timelion","params":{"expression":".es(index='*resources*latest*', timefield='res_date_created', metric='sum:res_size').cusum().label('Disk Size in GB').divide(1000000000).lines(fill=2,steps=0)","interval":"auto"},"aggs":[],"listeners":{}}

_source.title: Resource Size by Date Created
_source.visState: {"title":"Resource Size by Date Created","type":"timelion","params":{"expression":".es(index=*resources*latest*, timefield=res_date_created, metric='sum:res_size').bars().divide(1000000000).label('Resource Size in GB')","interval":"auto"},"aggs":[],"listeners":{}}
